name: AppcircleTestingDistribution
description: Efficiently distribute application builds to users or testing groups using Appcircle's robust platform.
author: appcircle

inputs.name: personalAPIToken
inputs.label: Appcircle Personal API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Appcircle Personal API Token to authenticate connections to Appcircle services. This token allows your Azure DevOps pipeline to interact with Appcircle for distributing applications.

inputs.name: authEndpoint
inputs.label: Auth Endpoint URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the authentication endpoint URL for self-hosted Appcircle installations. Default is the cloud endpoint: https://auth.appcircle.io

inputs.name: apiEndpoint
inputs.label: API Endpoint URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the API endpoint URL for self-hosted Appcircle installations. Default is the cloud endpoint: https://api.appcircle.io

inputs.name: profileName
inputs.label: Testing Distribution Profile Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the profile name of the Appcircle distribution profile. This name uniquely identifies the profile under which your applications will be distributed

inputs.name: createProfileIfNotExists
inputs.label: Create Profile If Not Exists
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify whether to create a new app profile if one does not already exist.

inputs.name: appPath
inputs.label: App Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to your application file. Supported file extensions are .ipa, .apk, .aab, and .zip.

inputs.name: message
inputs.label: Message
inputs.helpMarkDown: Message to include with the distribution to provide additional information to testers or users receiving the build
